user_question: What would a virtual reality theme park look like in the year 2050?
final_answer: A virtual reality theme park in 2050 could feature fully immersive environments with real-time adaptive AI, haptic feedback suits, and neural interfaces, allowing visitors to experience fantastical worlds with all senses engaged.
